mainEntity.name: What file formats are supported for Shopify collection exports?

acceptedAnswer.text: Our tool supports CSV, JSON, XML, and Excel formats for maximum compatibility with various systems and workflows.

mainEntity.name: Can I schedule automatic backups of my Shopify collections?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, you can set up automated backup schedules to run daily, weekly, or monthly to ensure your collection data is always protected.

mainEntity.name: Does the tool preserve collection metadata and product associations?

acceptedAnswer.text: Absolutely. Our export tool maintains all collection metadata, product relationships, and custom fields to ensure complete data fidelity.

mainEntity.name: Is there a limit to the number of collections I can export?

acceptedAnswer.text: No, our tool can handle stores of any size and export unlimited collections in batch processes for optimal performance.
